title: Five Years In, Backstage Is Just Getting Started
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: An exclusive interview with Spotify's head of platforms and tech and CNCF's CTO talking about the future of the giant Backstage open source project.
cntitle: Backstage 五年：一切才刚刚开始
cndescription: Spotify 平台和技术负责人与 CNCF 首席技术官畅谈巨型 Backstage 开源项目未来，独家专访。
